name: Ribbon Corset - Black/White Brocade
description: The best-selling Honey Cooler Handmade Ribbon Corset has been drafted from an extant Victorian corset and modified to fit a modern body. Wear it as a head-turning part of your boudoir ensemble or layer it over a dress for a sexy, yet feminine take on everyday streetwear. This corset has been made with a shimmering French brocade ribbon, steel bones and silver hardware, with white satin laces cut extra long. Please note while a substantial cinch can be attained with a Honey Cooler Handmade Ribbon Corset, this piece is not intended for tight lacing. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Deco Garter Belt - Black
description: The Deco Collection Garter Belt will take your Honey Cooler Handmade lingerie ensemble to the next level. This simply sweet piece is sewn from sueded silk charmeuse with ruched covered elastic panels and garter straps. Aluminum garter grips and a no-nonsense back closure ensure that everything stays in place comfortably. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Deco Skull Camisole
description: The ultimate marriage of luxury and painstaking lace work, the Deco Collection Skull Camisole is the perfect piece for both day-to-day layering and night-to-night lounging. Sewn from a luxurious silk sueded charmeuse and straight-cut, this flattering piece makes a feminine, yet tough-as-nails addition to any wardrobe. In Honey Cooler Handmade signature style, this Camisole features a totally sheer skull motif, offering a sexy glimpse of what's beneath - bare skin or lingerie - the possibilities are endless. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Cotillion Bloomers
description: Our Cotillion Collection Bloomers are comfortable and flirtatious. Sewn from a cotton/poly dotted Swiss fabric, and cut with generous ease, these Bloomers feature covered elasticized hems in a sexily sweet homage to time long past. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Cotillion Crop Top
description: The Cotillion Collection Crop Top is a flirtatious and versatile addition to your loungewear collection. Sewn from a cotton/poly dotted Swiss fabric with sheer point d'esprit panels, faux corset detailing, slider straps and an elastic waistband, it's fun, functional and sweetly sexy, sure to turn heads wherever you go. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Cotillion Knickers
description: Cotillion Collection Knickers are sewn from a cotton/poly dotted Swiss fabric with a sheer point d'esprit panel and faux corset detailing. They feature an elastic-ruched rear, French seams, silk gusset and picot elastic trim. Sweetly sexy, they make a flirtatious and comfortable underpinning. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Deco Bralette - Pink
description: With the Deco Collection Bralette, the flapper bra of old receives a sexy, modern update. Sewn from silk sueded charmeuse with a pintucked front, luxurious slider straps and a comfortable back closure, the Deco Bralette is sure to turn heads. In Honey Cooler Handmade signature style, this Bralette features a totally sheer vintage lace appliqué heart over the center of each cup, offering an enticing glimpse of what's beneath. A note about sizing: A size Small best fits 32B, a size Medium best fits a 34B and a size Large best fits 36B. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Deco Trio Set - Pink
description: Give the gift of three: a Deco Collection Bralette, Garter Belt and Knickers - the most sensual of sets, all sewn in pink silk sueded charmeuse. With a pintucked front, luxurious slider straps and a comfortable back closure, the Deco Collection Bralette is a guaranteed head-turner. In Honey Cooler Handmade signature style, this Bralette features a totally sheer vintage lace appliqué heart over the center of each cup, offering an enticing glimpse of what's beneath. The coordinating Garter Belt features ruched covered elastic panels and garter straps. Aluminum garter grips and a no-nonsense back closure ensure that everything stays in place comfortably. The matching Knickers feature elastic-ruched rear, French seams, bamboo gusset and ruffled elastic trim, making for a luxuriously comfortable underpinning. Even better? A totally sheer lace bow motif sits front and center. A note about sizing: A size Small best fits 32B, a size Medium best fits a 34B and a size Large best fits 36B. These items are handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff

name: Deco Sleep Mask - Pink
description: The Deco Collection Sleep Mask is a luxurious way to kick off a long flight across the sea, or just a well-deserved visit to dreamland in your own (or a lover's) bed. Sewn from sueded silk charmeuse with a comfortable and lofty cotton and poly fill, plus a generously-cut covered elastic band, this Sleep Mask is a cozy and pretty addition to any nighttime ensemble. In Honey Cooler Handmade signature style, this Sleep Mask features a sheer chevron insertion lace appliqué on the front. This item is handmade to order in the Honey Cooler Handmade atelier in San Francisco. Please allow 2 weeks for completion. Photography: Antonette Streeter of Her Lovely Bones | Model: Alexis Hutt | Styling: Dominique Guillen | Hair & Makeup: Rebecca Taff
